title: You are invited to be a Clerk.

content: Clerks is a sacred membership society dedicated to the preservation of culture. Clerks is led by Q-Tip and RZA, and designed to last for 1000 years. We think you can help us.
To offer you membership, we must test your kindness, curiosity and willingness to serve. There is no right or wrong answer to any question.
Please create a peaceful environment for yourself and focus for the next 30 minutes. Rest assured, your private information will never be shared with anyone, for any reason, without your consent.

title: What is your full name?

properties.placeholder: First and Last Name

description: We need your complete name for our records

title: What is your email address?

properties.placeholder: your.email@example.com

description: We'll use this to contact you about your application status

title: What is your phone number?
subtitle: Soon after you finish, a Clerk will call to discuss your application.

properties.placeholder: Your phone number with country code

description: A Clerk will call you soon to discuss your application

title: What are your primary social media handles?

properties.placeholder:
Instagram: @yourusername
Twitter: @yourusername
Other platforms...

description: Please list your main social media accounts (Instagram, Twitter, etc.). This helps us understand your cultural engagement.

title: Which cultural domains are you passionate about?
description: As a potential Clerk, we want to understand where your expertise and passion lie

title: Which cultural domains would you like to learn more about?
description: We want to understand your active participation in cultural life

title: How do you currently engage with culture and the arts?

choices.label: I create original works (music, art, writing, etc.)
I curate and collect works by others
I regularly attend concerts, exhibitions, readings
I write reviews, criticism, or commentary
I teach or share knowledge with others
I research and study cultural history
I organize cultural events in my community
I have the best taste in the group chat

description: We want to understand your active participation in cultural life
